qqa.db.dataset
Class Interface

java.lang.Object
  qqa.db.dataset.Interface

public class Interface
extends java.lang.Object

class that implements an interface to the dataset as stored in the database: it allows to output data and statistics in human readable form to file

Author:
Mattia Tomasoni

 void statisticsDataset(java.lang.String Name)
